    • Method Detail

      • getDataFromUrl

        public static MmtfStructure getDataFromUrl(String pdbCode)
                                    throws IOException
        Find the message pack byte array from the web using the input code and a base url. Caches the file if possible.
        Parameters:
        pdbCode - the pdb code for the desired structure.
        Returns:
        the MMTFBean of the deserialized data
        Throws:
        IOException - if the data cannot be read from the URL

      • deflateGzip

        public static byte[] deflateGzip(byte[] inputBytes)
                          throws IOException
        Deflate a gzip byte array.
        Parameters:
        inputBytes - a gzip compressed byte array
        Returns:
        a deflated byte array
        Throws:
        IOException - error in gzip input stream

      • getDataFromFile

        public static MmtfStructure getDataFromFile(Path filePath)
                                     throws IOException
        A function to get MMTF data from a file path.
        Parameters:
        filePath - the full path of the file to be read
        Returns:
        the deserialized MmtfStructure
        Throws:
        IOException - an error reading the file
